text: Tim Sanders is a New Zealand film producer. ==Filmography== ===Films=== * The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (2001) — producer * Whale Rider (2002) — producer * Perfect Creature (2007) — producer * The Insatiable Moon (2010) — executive producer ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:American film producers Category:Filmmakers who won the Best Film BAFTA Award Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Tim Sanders (filmmaker)
